name: Guard Stone
description: [Accessory] A charm that increases Defense.

name: Guard Ring
description: [Accessory] A ring that increases Defense.

name: Power Stone
description: [Accessory] A charm that increases Attack.

name: Power Ring
description: [Accessory] A ring that increases Attack.

name: Speed Stone
description: [Accessory] A charm that increases Agility.

name: Speed Ring
description: [Accessory] A ring that increases Agility.

name: Lucky Stone
description: [Accessory] A charm that increases Luck.

name: Lucky Ring
description: [Accessory] A ring that increases Luck.

name: Magical Stone
description: [Accessory] A charm that increases M.Attack.

name: Magical Ring
description: [Accessory] A ring that increases M.Attack.

name: Shooter Stone
description:
[Accessory] A charm that increases the Hit Rate of
attacks.

name: Shooter Ring
description:
[Accessory] A ring that increases the Hit Rate of
attacks.

name: Master Stone
description: [Accessory] A charm that reduces MP Cost by 20%.

name: Master Ring
description: [Accessory] A ring that reduces MP Cost by 50%.

name: Poison Guard
description:
[Accessory] A ring that helps prevent Poison and
Paralysis states.

name: Super Poison Guard
description:
[Accessory] A ring that entirely prevents Poison
and Paralysis states.

name: Elemental Guard
description:
[Accessory] Damage inflicted by Fire, Water, Wind,
and Earth attacks is halved.

name: Mental Guard
description:
[Accessory] A ring that helps prevent Sleep,
Silence, Confusion, Charm, and Rage states.

name: Super Mental Guard
description:
[Accessory] A ring that entirely prevents Sleep,
Silence, Confusion, Charm, and Rage states.

name: Spectacles
description: [Accessory] Sharpens eyesight and increases hit rate.

name: Enemy Radar
description:
[Accessory] Raises the chance of performing a
preemptive attack.

name: Warning Bell
description: [Accessory] Prevents surprise attacks.

name: Stocker
description:
[Accessory] Allows you to carryover TP over into the
next battle.

name: Ring of Guts
description: [Accessory] Increases TP Charge Rate.

name: MP Keeper
description: [Accessory] Decreases MP Cost Rate.
